text: Romeville is an unincorporated community and census-designated place in St. James Parish, Louisiana, United States. Its population was 130 as of the 2010 census. The community is located along Louisiana Highway 44 on the east bank of the Mississippi River. ==Geography== According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the community has an area of ; of its area is land, and is water. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in St. James Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana Category:Census- designated places in St. James Parish, Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Louisiana
title: Romeville, Louisiana
